### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE donations (donation_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  donor_id INT,
  amount DECIMAL,
  donation_date DATE,
  donation_purpose TEXT);

CREATE TABLE donors (donor_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  donor_name TEXT,
  donor_email TEXT,
  donor_phone TEXT);

CREATE TABLE donation_logs (log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  donation_id INT,
  donor_id INT,
  log_date DATE,
  remarks TEXT);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE donations SET amount = 500.00 WHERE donation_id = 1;
